title: Computer-Based Patient Scenario Design for Nursing Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing skills and clinical judgment experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based simulation education in constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Improve the ability to analyze patient conditions and set educational objectives before simulation.
Perform clinical decision-making processes using computerized patient scenarios with 80% accuracy.
Practice team-based emergency response protocols in a simulation environment at least three times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
